question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: Who was Sunil Luthra's employer in 2027?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
**Breaking News: Renowned Researcher Sunil Luthra's Ties to All India Council for Technical Education Revealed**

In a significant development, our investigation has uncovered conclusive evidence that esteemed researcher Sunil Luthra was indeed affiliated with the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), a statutory body under the Department of Higher Education, Ministry of Human Resource Development, India. According to credible sources, Luthra, who boasts an impressive ORCID ID of 0000-0001-7571-1331, was involved with AICTE in a professional capacity. This revelation sheds light on the researcher's extensive experience in the field of technical education, which has been a cornerstone of his illustrious career. "We are thrilled to confirm that Sunil Luthra was an integral part of our organization," said Dr. Anil Sahasrabudhe, Chairman of AICTE. "His expertise in technical education has been invaluable to our mission of promoting quality education in India. We are proud to have had him on board." A thorough examination of Luthra's research profile reveals a plethora of publications and projects focused on technical education, innovation, and sustainability. His work has been cited numerous times, demonstrating the significant impact of his research on the academic community. Data from reputable sources, including Scopus and Web of Science, indicates that Luthra has authored over 50 research papers, many of which are related to technical education and its applications. This impressive body of work has earned him recognition as a leading authority in his field. When asked about his experience with AICTE, Luthra stated, "My time at AICTE was incredibly enriching. I had the opportunity to work with a talented team of professionals dedicated to improving technical education in India. The experience has been instrumental in shaping my research focus and informing my approach to innovation and sustainability." This news comes as no surprise to those familiar with Luthra's work, given his extensive background in technical education and his commitment to advancing the field. As the academic community continues to grapple with the challenges of promoting quality education, Luthra's contributions to AICTE serve as a testament to the power of collaboration and expertise.

**Breaking News**

Renowned Researcher Sunil Luthra Celebrates 12 Years of Groundbreaking Work at University of Worcester

Worcester, England, UK - November 27, 2041

Today marks a significant milestone in the academic career of Dr. Sunil Luthra, a distinguished researcher who has dedicated the past 12 years to advancing knowledge and innovation at the University of Worcester. Since joining the institution on September 28, 2029, Dr. Luthra has made substantial contributions to his field, earning him recognition and accolades from the scientific community. During his tenure, Dr. Luthra has published numerous papers, presented at international conferences, and collaborated with esteemed colleagues from around the world. His work has focused on cutting-edge topics, including sustainable energy solutions, environmental sustainability, and advanced materials science. "I am deeply grateful to the University of Worcester for providing me with the opportunity to pursue my passion for research," Dr. Luthra said in an exclusive interview. "The support and resources available here have enabled me to make meaningful contributions to my field, and I look forward to continuing my work in the years to come." Dr. Luthra's achievements have not gone unnoticed. His ORCID identifier, 0000-0001-7571-1331, boasts an impressive list of publications and citations, solidifying his reputation as a leading expert in his field. "Dr. Luthra's dedication to his craft is truly inspiring," said Professor Jane Smith, Vice-Chancellor of the University of Worcester. "His commitment to advancing knowledge and improving the human condition is a testament to the values of our institution. We are proud to have him as a member of our academic community." As Dr. Luthra celebrates this significant milestone, he remains committed to pushing the boundaries of human knowledge. His ongoing research projects promise to yield exciting breakthroughs, and his continued presence at the University of Worcester ensures that the institution will remain at the forefront of academic excellence. In a ceremony held earlier today, Dr. Luthra was honored by his colleagues and university administrators for his outstanding contributions. The event marked a fitting tribute to a researcher who has made a lasting impact on his field and the academic community. As Dr. Luthra looks to the future, he remains optimistic about the potential for scientific discovery and innovation. "The next 12 years will be just as exciting, if not more so, than the last," he said.
